title: Exception Handling via Try-Catch pattern using Scope action
description: This Logic Apps workflow represents the try-catch pattern for exception handling using Scope action
detailsDescription: This Logic Apps workflow is designed to execute specified business logic, and if any errors occur, it catches and processes those errors, and terminates the workflow with a detailed error message. Learn more about exception handling in Logic Apps [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/logic-apps/error-exception-handling?tabs=standard)
